meanings.sent1: The ghost was unbodied and floated through the walls.
meanings.sent2: The idea of a spirit being unbodied is common in folklore.
meanings.sent3: The unbodied voice on the phone made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: Her unbodied presence lingered in the room long after she had left.
meanings.sent5: The concept of an unbodied soul is both fascinating and mysterious.

meanings.sent1: The unbodied thoughts of the author were finally put on paper.
meanings.sent2: The essence of love is often described as unbodied and intangible.
meanings.sent3: The unbodied emotions seemed to dance around the room.
meanings.sent4: His unbodied dreams took flight in the vast expanse of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The music evoked an unbodied sense of nostalgia in the listeners.
